links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
formula: G.f.: x(3-5x)/((1-x)^2*(1-2x)). Binomial transform of 0,3,1,1,... (1 continued). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 17 2008]
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 200, write("b061761.txt", n, " ", 2^n + 2*n - 1) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 20 2001
